predicate.note: Frames file for 'unblock' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: someone tell wsj authors to stop making up words
example.text: In Honduras, where the Contras are a hot political issue, he promised [*-1] to help unblock some $70 million in assistance withheld due to the failure of local agencies to comply with conditions agreed upon with Washington.
example.arg: some $70 million in assistance withheld due to the failure of local agencies to comply with conditions agreed upon with Washington
